description:
'''Noise rock''' is a [[rock music]] genre that emerged in the late 1970s and early 1980s. Artists fuse rock music to noise, while utilizing extreme levels of [[Distortion (music)|distortion]] through the use of [[electric guitar]]s. 

Notable acts include [[Sonic Youth]], [[Big Black]], [[Swans (band)|Swans]], [[Flipper (band)|Flipper]], [[Cows (band)|Cows]], [[Scratch Acid]], [[No Trend]] and [[the Jesus Lizard]].{{sfn|Blush|2016|p=266}}
